info.title: Planetary Data System API
info.description:
Federated PDS API which provides actionable end points standardized
between the different nodes.

externalDocs.description: Find out more information on the PDS API Specification

tags.name: core
tags.description: Federated core layer for PDS requests

get.summary: search across all PDS data products, including bundles, collections, documentation, context and observational products,

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: offset in matching result list, for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of matching results returned, for pagination

parameters.name: only-summary
parameters.description: only return the summary, useful to get the list of available properties

parameters.description: maximum number of matching results returned, for pagination

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: offset in matching result list, for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of matching results returned, for pagination

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: search query, complex query uses eq,ne,gt,ge,lt,le,(,),not,and,or. Properties are named as in 'properties' attributes, literals are strings between " or numbers. Detailed query specification is available at https://bit.ly/393i1af

parameters.name: only-summary
parameters.description: only return the summary, useful to get the list of available properties

X-Total-Count.description: Total number of records maching the request.

get.summary: get products belonging to a given bundle

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: offset in matching result list, for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of matching results returned, for pagination

parameters.name: only-summary
parameters.description: only return the summary, useful to get the list of available properties

hits.description: total number of matching results. -1 indicates an excessive amount of resource required to compute it

took.description: Number of milliseconds it "took" to do request

start_date_time.description: start date time of the observations in ISO8601

stop_date_time.description: stop date time of the observations in ISO8601

investigations.description: list of missions or observing campaigns which produced the data

observing_system_components.description: list of instruments or platforms generating the data

targets.description: list of targets or feature of interest the observation.

properties.description: properties extracted from pds4 model, syntax for property name is <namespace>:<property>[/<namespace>:<property>]*

title.description: name to display for the external reference

href.description: external reference url of the current reference resolvable by the current API server, http://pds.nasa.gov/api/products/urn:nasa...

type.description: type of the external reference, can be displayed as an icon for example

description.description: longer description for the external reference, can be displayed in a tooltip

reference.description: object describing a reference to a different product. TODO The properties should be defined by a standard (xlink, json-ld) to be chosen

example.message: query operator gt not supported on field mission
